body.p: Because of continued bad health, I have concluded to resign my office as Magistrate in the Poosey District Madson Co. We would recommend in our stead the appoint of Elisha W. Roberts, we would say of him, that he has ever been considered a good loyal man.

Respectfully
Thomas M. Hart
Madison Co
J. P.
Resigned

Resignation accepted Sept 18, 1863
Tho E Bramlette
